td.content: s:patient presents with 6 weeks history of Kidney. pt is a white female retired aged 78 years. she denies smoking denies any alcohol use o:Height 69 in, Weight 128 lbs, Temperature 98.6 F, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16 a:Chronic Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Lisinopril - 20 mg daily, and ordered Basic Metabolic Panel, Urinalysis.

s:patient presents with Kidney for 6 weeks. patient is a 79 yr old female retired. denies any alcohol use she does not smoke o:Height 70 in, Weight 130 lbs, Temperature 98.8 F, Pulse 92, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16 a:Chronic Renal Failure p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Lisinopril - 20 mg daily, and ordered Abdominal CT Scan.
